Try that somewhere else.But a general recommendation for Telegram. It's not a safe platform to conduct trades with unknown individuals because either of the two parties can delete the complete conversation history whenever they want. You do it only with people you trust, maybe not even then. And you never trust someone claiming to be a reliable person on Telegram. Always check that information by contacting them via other verifiable means.
